overview: Includes 3 episodes: "Sister's love", which depicts the forbidden unrequited love of preparatory school students, "Aoi experience", in which a job hunting / female college student became a maid, and "I want to be a sister", which depicts living with her brother-in-law. Light love has a forbidden scent ... A carefully selected collection of omnibus that depicts a sweet first experience.
title: Aoi Keiken Kindan SPECIAL
